Shun Oguri

Shun Oguri

Shun Oguri is a Japanese actor, voice actor, and director most well-known for his roles in "Rich Man, Poor Woman", the "Hana Yori Dango" series, and the "Crows Zero" series. He made his directorial debut with "Surely Someday" (2011).

  • Known For
    Acting
  • Born
    26 December 1982 (age 38)
  • Place of Birth
    Tokyo, Japan
